channel.title: Java error
channel.description:
So I downloaded some clients, and I keep getting this error about java. Can someone tell me how to set the path or anything? I'm sure my Java's up to date. I just installed the newist version off the site.
The system cannot find the path specified ' Java ' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file

item.title: Java error
item.dc:creator: @brovolll brovolll
item.description:
@brovolll wrote:

[quote=“Oriks, post:2, topic:269710”]You need to edit the run.bat to your version of java.[/quote]No not really there is no way to edit new version of java into run its something else… which im trying to find it too lmao

Read full topic
